name: Winter Truck Driver Cargo Simulator Game
name_original: Winter Truck Driver Cargo Simulator Game
description:
Winter Truck Cargo Simulator game

Do you like to operate heavy equipment like cranes, construction trucks, diggers, excavators and transporter trucks?
If yes, then you would love to play this snow cleaner truck 3D sim game. Drive the vehicle around the city on snowy terrain.
Your mission is to break and clear road blockage of frozen ice on the roads so traffic can mobilize smoothly and safely in this snowbank weather and slipper asphalt. Accept the snowplow truck driving games challenge; enjoy extremely dangerous driving with Snow Blower Truck Sim 3D driving simulator game.
Enjoy amazing Truck Driving 3D simulator game in your android phone and tablets.
Drive heavy excavator crane for dumping all snowfall into dumper trucks.
Enjoy operating amazing construction cranes with hill climb challenges in slippery tracks.
Choose real trucks, to drive in real cities with real names in this elaborate simulation.
Many different trucks to explore the gorgeous landscapes and environments on Truck Simulator 2016.
Use your hill climb truck driving as well as construction side operating skills of gigantic crane excavator operator in slippery tracks .

key features:

Huge 3D snowy landscape environment.

Real excessive snowfall and slippy land sliding effect.

HD graphics and superb sounds to enhance your gaming experience
